thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zendesk Q4 Revenue Rose 39 Percent To $123.4 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zendesk Q4 Revenue Rose 39 Percent To $123.4 Mln
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Zendesk Inc:
* ZENDESK ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL FISCAL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.26 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 39 PERCENT TO $123.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $555 MILLION TO $565 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $125 MILLION TO $127 MILLION * FOR QUARTER ENDING MARCH 31, 2018, ZENDESK EXPECTS TO REPORT GAAP OPERATING LOSS OF $33.0 MILLION - 35.0 MILLION
* FOR QUARTER ENDING MARCH 31, 2018, ZENDESK EXPECTS TO REPORT NON-GAAP OPERATING LOSS OF $3.0 MILLION - 5.0 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.04, REVENUE VIEW $119.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP OPERATING LOSS OF $113.0 MILLION - 118.0 MILLION
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $123.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $553.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP OPERATING LOSS OF $0.0 MILLION - 5.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
